headline: Corning (GLW): Has the Recent Share Price Surge Left the Stock Overvalued or Still Undervalued?
summary: Corning (GLW) has quietly turned into one of the market’s steadier compounders, with the stock up sharply over the past year. That makes today a good moment to revisit what is driving the story. See our latest analysis for Corning. Over the past year, a string of upbeat earnings and improving demand signals has helped Corning’s share price climb to $85.42, with an 82.87 percent year to date share price return and a 192.37 percent three year total shareholder return. This suggests momentum is...
